start.text: Awww, no! I was just beginning to get comfortable!
I know there's gonna be trouble! There's always trouble!
Let's hope they don't feel like fighting!

retreat.text: I need a nice, warm bed...
Sometimes I wish I never left my room...

running.text: I'm gonna have to change my underwear...

hull_50.text: Oh my God... this is so painful...
Oh my God! Oh my God!!

hull_30.text: Oh my God!! I'm a dead man!!

overload.text: It's broke! Why does my stuff always break?!
Oh my God! I'm... I'm blind!

victory.text: Ahh, I was never worried! Heh heh...
All clear! And I'm still alive!
